FuncDef:
The hwtacacs-server timer quiet command configures the HWTACACS server quiet timeout value.
The undo hwtacacs-server timer quiet command resets the HWTACACS server quiet timeout value to its default value.
By default, the server quiet timeout value is 5 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the quiet timeout value.
It is an integer data type. The value range is from 1 to 255 minutes. The default value is 5 minutes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the primary HWTACACS server restores the active state, checking whether the HWTACACS template is being used by some users is not required.
